description: Just when you think things are calming down, Quentin discovers that his roommate and his girlfriend were a bit careless in their sexual adventures and managed to live cast Jimmy and Mark's sexual adventure. Overwhelmed by the responses from viewers and the amount of money it made, he convinces Jimmy to keep the video up and think about keeping the business going. Unfortunately, Mark doesn't feel the same way about the situation when Ty gives him a call and let's him know about the now viral video. Ty's aroused and his curiosity is at a peak as he watches the video and decides it's time he get's in on the action. With the success of this unexpected chain of events, Quentin finds himself with a blessing in his lap as he makes the decision to not be used by the casting director, Dean Phoenix, when he notices him kissing another actor at the studio.  The timing couldn't be more perfect considering Mark wants the video deleted immediately and it was done without his knowledge. Ty joining forces with Jimmy and Quentin prove to be the magic that sets the internet on fire as they quickly rise to the most viewed live webcam show in internet history.
title: Straight Chexxx Episode 4
